sentences.en: Gaze detection can endow quotidian machines with seemingly magical behavior.
sentences.cn: 这种视线侦测系统可以让日常用品做出看似神奇的行为.

sentences.en: I had hopes of escaping my quotidian world.
sentences.cn: 我曾希望能逃离自己的日常生活。

sentences.en: Most solutions to the problem of global warming are tediously, almost oppressively, quotidian.
sentences.cn: 大多数应对全球变暖的措施都是冗长乏味, 几近压制, 以及司空见惯的.

sentences.en: Since then, other researchers have come up with other quotidian examples of event horizons.
sentences.cn: 而之后, 其他研究人员也提出了关于视界的其它司空见惯的种种例子.

sentences.en: Since then, other researchers have come up with other quotidian examples of horizons.
sentences.cn: 从此之后, 其他研究者们也提出了有关视界的司空见惯的例子.

sentences.en: Television has become part of our quotidian existence.
sentences.cn: 电视已成为我们日常生活的一部分。

words.tran_cn: 每日的；平凡的；每日发作的

trans.tran_cn: 每日的，每日发生的，平凡的，普通的
